content.raw:
This is now ready for review. There's still some outstanding issues in the PR.

* A number of functions return `GenerateInvalidId()` when the containing entity has been removed. This could possibly lead to segfaults. I left a comment in an example context [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/56/use-references-in-an-entity/diff#comment-89271000)
* Getting the index of an entity when the entity has been removed. I left a comment in an example context [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/56/use-references-in-an-entity/diff#comment-89271304)
content.html:
This is now ready for review. There's still some outstanding issues in the PR.

  • A number of functions return GenerateInvalidId() when the containing entity has been removed. This could possibly lead to segfaults. I left a comment in an example context here
  • Getting the index of an entity when the entity has been removed. I left a comment in an example context here
